title: Ben Stokes

coverImage.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.0 Generic license.

summary: Ben Stokes is an English international cricketer and former vice-captain of the England Test team.

value.label: Benjamin Andrew Stokes
Invalid Date (age 27)
Christchurch, New Zealand
British
All-rounder
Attacking middle-order left-handed batsman

image.altText: Style of play for Ben Stokes
image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Generic license.

value.label: Stokes made his first-class debut for Durham against the Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC)
Stokes made his international debut in a One Day International (ODI) against Ireland in August 2011.
Stokes was part of the England team that finished as runner's up in the tournament
Rising Pune Supergiant was an IPL cricket team based in Pune
Stokes holds the record for England's fastest ever Test double-century

image.altText: Stokes holds the record for England's fastest ever Test double-century

value.label: Stokes holds the record for the most runs scored by an individual batsman in the morning session of a Test match

image.altText: Stokes holds the record for the most runs scored by an individual batsman in the morning session of a Test match

value.label: Stokes has the second highest number of sixes (11) in a Test innings

image.altText: Stokes has the second highest number of sixes (11) in a Test innings

value.label: Along with Johnny Bairstow, Stokes holds the record for the highest Test partnership for the sixth wicket.

image.altText: Along with Johnny Bairstow, Stokes holds the record for the highest Test partnership for the sixth wicket.

value.label: The England cricket team represents England and Wales in international cricket. England and Australia were the first teams to play a Test match in 1877
